 2003-02442003-02-25,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of PATRICK MICHAEL ESMOND CASE of Guelph, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 2, 2003.
